At 20th level, you surround yourself with an aura of gloom. Using your bonus action, you undergo a transformation. For 1 hour, you gain the following benefits:

  • The any bright light in a 30-foot radius around the paladin to is reduced to dim light and you have resistance to bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage.
  • Creatures that rely on sight have disadvantage on attack rolls against creatures in the 30-foot radius around you.
  • As a bonus action on your turn you cause the shadows in the 30-foot radius around you to attack one creature. The paladin makes a melee spell attack against the target. If the attack hits, the target takes psychic damage equal to 3d10 + the paladin's Charisma modifier.

Once you use this bonus action, you cannot use it again until you finish a long rest, unless you expend a 5th-level spell slot to use it again.
